name: COOLYARD.WAD
description: This level was designed to be used as a Deathmatch level for Doom2. This level is centered around a central building, within a courtyard. There are two of each weapon available, except for the BFG. There is only one BFG! There are a few monsters here and there. There are many secret rooms and teleporters. There are good locations for snipers and lots of dark rooms and walk through walls. You can also trap your enemy in a cage, if you're good enough. There is an exit on this level.
